00028 class CommandEngine
00029 {
00030 private:
00034         typedef enum command_criticality_
00035         {
00036                 FATAL,   
00037                 CRITICAL,
00038                 WARNING  
00039         } command_criticality;
00040 
00041         typedef boost::function<bool (std::string& data, oryxsrr_msgs::Command::Response& response)> command_func;      
00042         typedef boost::unordered_map<std::string, std::pair<command_func, command_criticality> > command_map;
00043 public:
00044         CommandEngine()
00045 {
00046                 init();
00047                 bindCommands();
00048 }
00049         CommandEngine(ros::NodeHandle& nh):
00050                 nh_(nh)
00051         {
00052                 init();
00053                 bindCommands();
00054         }
00055         virtual ~CommandEngine(){};
00056 private:
00057         ros::NodeHandle nh_;            
00058         ros::ServiceServer comm_srv_; 
00059 
00064         command_map com_map_;
00065 
00069         void init()
00070         {
00071                 this->comm_srv_ = this->nh_.advertiseService("/global_planning/commands", &CommandEngine::commandCB, this);
00072         }
00076         void bindCommands()
00077         {
00078                 //Command keywords
00079                 std::string start_com("start");
00080                 std::string stop_com("stop");
00081                 std::string manual_com("manual");
00082                 std::string auto_com("autonomous");
00083                 //Bind keywords to their callback
00084                 this->com_map_[start_com].first  = boost::bind(&CommandEngine::startCB, this, _1, _2);
00085                 this->com_map_[start_com].second = FATAL;
00086 
00087                 this->com_map_[stop_com].first   =boost::bind(&CommandEngine::stopCB, this, _1, _2);
00088                 this->com_map_[stop_com].second  = FATAL;
00089 
00090                 this->com_map_[manual_com].first =boost::bind(&CommandEngine::manCB, this, _1, _2);
00091                 this->com_map_[manual_com].second= FATAL;
00092 
00093                 this->com_map_[auto_com].first   =boost::bind(&CommandEngine::autoCB, this, _1, _2);
00094                 this->com_map_[auto_com].second  = FATAL;
00095         }
00096 
00103         bool commandCB(oryxsrr_msgs::Command::Request& request, oryxsrr_msgs::Command::Response& response)
00104         {
00105                 std::string command_message("Could Not Process The Command: ");
00106                 //Check to see if the command is registered
00107                 if(this->com_map_.count(request.command)==1)
00108                 {
00109                         //Try to process the command
00110                         if(!this->com_map_[request.command].first(request.data, response))
00111                         {
00112                                 //If it failed, handle the consequences
00113                                 switch(this->com_map_[request.command].second)
00114                                 {
00115                                 case FATAL:
00116                                         ROS_FATAL_STREAM(command_message<<request.command<<": "<<response.data);
00117                                         break;
00118                                 case CRITICAL:
00119                                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM(command_message<<request.command<<": "<<response.data);
00120                                         break;
00121                                 case WARNING:
00122                                         ROS_WARN_STREAM(command_message<<request.command<<": "<<response.data);
00123                                         break;
00124                                 default:
00125                                         break;
00126                                 }
00127                         }
00128                         else
00129                         {
00130                                 response.success = true;
00131                                 return true;
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134                 else
00135                 {
00136                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Received Invalid Command: "<<request.command);
00137                         response.success = false;
00138                         return false;
00139                 }
00140                 return false;
00141         }
00142 
00151         bool startCB(std::string& data, oryxsrr_msgs::Command::Response& response)
00152         {
00153                 return false;
00154         }
00155 
00164         bool stopCB(std::string& data, oryxsrr_msgs::Command::Response& response)

00166                 return false;
00167         }

00180                 return false;
00181         }

00192         {
00193                 return false;
00194         }

00205         std::string local_planner_topic("occupancy_point_cloud_topic");

00207         std::string command_topic("/global_planning/commands");
00208 
00209         //Configuration Parameters
00210         //*****************Configuration Parameters*******************//
00211         //Minimum update rate expected of occupancy grid
00212         std::string p_up_rate("occupancy/update_rate");
00213         double update_rate = 0.2;
00214         std::string up_rate_msg("");
00215         up_rate_msg+= boost::lexical_cast<double>(update_rate);
00216         up_rate_msg+="s";
00217 
00218         //x dimension of occupancy grid
00219         std::string p_x_dim("occupancy/x_dimension");
00220         double x_dim = 200;
00221         std::string x_dim_msg("");
00222         x_dim_msg+= boost::lexical_cast<double>(x_dim);
00223         x_dim_msg+="m";
00224 
00225         //y dimension of occupancy grid
00226         std::string p_y_dim("occupancy/y_dimension");
00227         double y_dim = 200;
00228         std::string y_dim_msg("");
00229         y_dim_msg+= boost::lexical_cast<double>(y_dim);
00230         y_dim_msg+="m";
00231 
00232         //z dimension of occupancy grid
00233         std::string p_z_dim("occupancy/z_dimension");
00234         double z_dim = 0;
00235         std::string z_dim_msg("");
00236         z_dim_msg+= boost::lexical_cast<double>(z_dim);
00237         z_dim_msg+="m";
00238 
00239         //resolution occupancy grid
00240         std::string p_res("occupancy/grid_resolution");
00241         double res = .01;
00242         std::string p_res_msg("");

00244         p_res_msg+="m";
